direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve a variable, but getVarValue returns the value while getVar returns the Var object.
Both methods retrieve a value based on a key, but getMsg retrieves a message key instead of a variable value.
Both methods involve retrieving an object (Arg or Var) based on a key and an additional parameter (position for Arg, none for Var).
Both methods involve accessing properties or variables, but getIndexedProperty accesses indexed properties of an object.
getVarValue depends on the result of getVarMap to retrieve the variable value, indicating a strong dependency.
